doc:
James Philbrook https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Philbrook 0 James Philbrook (October 22, 1924—October 24, 1982) was an American actor who appeared in supporting roles in three short-lived television series between 1959 and 1963: The Islanders on ABC and The Investigators and The New Loretta Young Show, both on CBS. He also appeared in several major films, as Bruce King in I Want to Live! (1958) and Henri in Woman Obsessed, both with Susan Hayward, and as Colonel Tall in the 1964 war picture The Thin Red Line, with Jack Warden. James_Philbrook ( October_22_,_1924 — October_24_,_1982 ) was an_American_actor who appeared in supporting roles in three_short-lived_television_series between 1959_and_1963 : The_Islanders on ABC and The_Investigators and The_New_Loretta_Young_Show , both on CBS . He also appeared in several_major_films , as Bruce_King in I Want_to_Live ! (_1958_) and Henri in Woman_Obsessed , both_with Susan_Hayward , and as Colonel_Tall in the_1964_war_picture The_Thin_Red_Line , with Jack_Warden .
